annotations:
Wish to remind you that we can still secure for sale following well maintained Japanese built panamax BC from our direct and local owners.
Prompty inspectable SINGAPORE
MV "DONOUSA"
ABT 76,429 DWT ON 14.02M DRAFT
BLT 04/04 TSUNEISHI SHIPYARD Japan
CLASS DNV 1A BULK CARRIER BIS E0 ESP GRAB(1-20 T) HC(M)
HOLDS(2,4,6)MAY BE EMPTY DD due 7/25 SS due 4/2027
LOA 225 M BEAM 32.26M
7 /7 HOLDS / HATCHES
ABT 91,356 CUM GRAIN
MITSUI MAN B&W.7S50MC
GENERATORS  3 X 440KW DAIHATSU 5DC-17
LDT 10,188 MT
BWTS FITTED / TECHROSS
EEXI/CII: C
RIGHTSHIP : 3 STARS
GHG:C+
ALL DETS GIVEN WOG
Pricewise the owners are REALISTIC sellers and invite outright offers in line with the market.
FYG she sailed from Russia where loaded for disch in FENGCENG China
(eta 3rd Sept for abt 4 days disch and BAYUQUAN where eta 14th Sept)
while meantime will call SINGAPORE for bunkers where eta 28th AUGUST
Inspection report issued by WILHEMSEN who inspected the vessel early June and is now available at cost.
We hold full tech data available here against serious named buyers.
Best regards
George Kaklamanos
_______________________________________________
DRYBULK S.A.
